message.content:
I need to identify the line item that represents the increase in taxes accrued but not yet paid from the cash flow statement.

Looking at the cash flow statement provided, I can see the line item "Increase (Decrease) in Tax Payable" with a value of 391297.55. 

The "Tax Payable" account represents taxes that have been accrued but not yet paid. Since this line item shows a positive amount, it indicates an increase in tax payable (taxes accrued but not yet paid).

Therefore, the specific value I need to extract is 391297.55.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '391297.55'}}
```
